page.title: 17 Visit To Cogges Farm Museum
page.content:
The children dressed as Edwardians and reported:- "I was a farm labourer and my name was Harry.My costume was a shirt and a waistcoat.We had a pair of cord trousers with braces,a pair of wellington boots and a cap and a neckerchief.First I brushed the horses. then I collected a bag of straw for the horses' stable.Then we had our sandwiches.When we finished we washed a sheep and cut all the black wool off the sheep's back.After that we polished the cart,straps and reins.Then we led the horse round the yard and got our wages."
by Andrew Clarke.
